45991.「レベルを上げて覚えた呪文は\n 覚えた職業でしか使えない 専用のものだ。\n:
When leveling up, you'll learn spells, and they'll only be available in the vocation you learned it.
However, there are two types of skills you can learn with "Skill Points": exclusive ones and ones usable by any vocation.
When looking at "Skill Points" or stats, you'll see (EX) next to exclusive skills. Make sure to check them carefully.

45992.「何について 知りたいのだ？\n<select_se_off>\n転職について\:
What would you like to know about?
<select_se_off>
Changing Vocations
About Skill Points
Transfer of Spells/Skills
<select_end>
<break>

45993.「スキルポイントは すべての職業で\n レベル２以上から 少しずつ取得していく\:
Skill points are earned gradually beginning at level 2. Think of them as like a blessing from the Allmighty Alltrades.
By allocating your skill points with the "Skill Points" command under "Misc.", you can learn various skills and traits.
Skill points are unique to each vocation. You won't lose them if you change, but they can only be allocated where they were earned.
So even if different vocations have the same skill lines, they will be assigned separately. Please remember that well.

45994.「転職とは もちろん 職業を変えることだ。\n はじめての職業に転職をすれば\n:
A career change is, of course, a change of occupation... When you change professions for the first time, you start your level all over
again. But each profession has its own level... If you change professions again, and you return to your original profession, your
level will return to your original profession, so don't worry... As long as you're qualified, there's no level limit to
changing jobs. You can change professions whenever you like, and you can always visit our priests...

You level up, you learn a spell, and it only works on the job you learned it for. If you change jobs, you won't be able to use them

79485.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Good. From here on, you will go forth as a <%sM_new_syokugyou>. First, you will learn this new ability.
<%sM_self> learned Scout Attack!
This is an essential skill that you will need when trying to scout monsters. Make sure to use it on a monster you want to join you.
If you win the battle after using it, the monster may wish to join you. Scout Attack also doesn't need to deal the finishing blow.

79486.「ただし スカウトアタックを使うためには\n 仲間にしたいモンスターの名前が付い:
However, before you can use Scout Attack, you must first read a scouting book, which has the name of the monster you desire.
After reading it, you will be able to use Scout Attack against it.
Scouting books can be bought in the basement of any tavern.

level all over again. But each job has its own level... If you change professions again and return to your original profession, your
level will return to that of your original profession, so don't worry. If you're a qualified candidate, there's no level
limit... You can change professions at will, so feel free to visit our priests at any time...

getting any more experience, but would you like me to send <%sM_monster> to the monster farm?

123220.「……む？\n モンスター牧場で 受け取れる経験値が\n あるようだな。\n<b:
... No? There's experience to be gained at the monster farm... In order to send them to the monster farm, you have to get the
experience first... The <%sM_monster> that you brought with you will be held at the Monster Tavern,
so you'll have to go through that process again after you get your experience...

123221.<color_yellow>つれている <%sM_monster>は\nモンスタ:
<color_yellow>My <%sM_monster> has been sent to
the monster farm!

123224.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Good. From here on, you will go forth as a <%sM_new_syokugyou>. First, you will learn this new ability.
<%sM_self> learned Scout Attack!
This is an essential skill that you will need when trying to scout monsters. Make sure to use it on a monster you want to join you.
If you win the battle after using it, the monster may wish to join you. Scout Attack also doesn't need to deal the finishing blow.

123225.「ただし スカウトアタックを使うためには\n 仲間にしたいモンスターの名前が付い:
However, before you can use Scout Attack, you must first read a scouting book, which has the name of the monster you desire.
After reading it, you will be able to use Scout Attack against it.
Scouting books can be bought in the basement of any tavern.

123226.「もっと くわしい話は 酒場の地下にある\n モンスター酒場で聞けるぞ。\n 何:
For more information, there's a monster bar in the basement of the tavern... If you need any help, just ask. And remember to read the
Scout's Book. And don't forget to check your equipment. Come on, let's go.

123227.「モンスターを仲間にする際には\n 先ほど覚えた スカウトアタックという\n <:
When you want to join a monster, you need to use the <%sM_new_syokugyou> scout attack that you just learned. If you win the
battle after using the scout attack, the monster will wake up and join you... You don't have to finish him off with that
move...

123228.「私からの説明は 以上だが\n もう一度 聞くかね？\n<yesno><clos:
That's all I have to say about that. Do you
want to hear it again?<yesno><close>

123229.<color_yellow>つれている <%sM_monster>は\nモンスタ:
<color_yellow><%sM_monster> has been sent to
the Monster Tavern!

123230.「<%sM_new_syokugyou>に転職すると\n まだ なついていない:
By changing to <%sM_new_syokugyou>, your
<%sM_monster> will be sent to the Monster Tavern.
Is this all right?
<yesno><close>

123231.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Good. From now on, you will live as <%sM_new_syokugyou>. The first thing you need to do is wake up to a new ability...
<%sM_self> has learned the Scout Attack feat!
Scouting attacks are similar for Monster Masters and Item Masters, but they target different monsters.
You'll need to read the Scout Book for your vocation before you can take them on. Scout books can be purchased in the basement of any
tavern. You'll have a new vocation with different equipment. Don't forget to review it. Let's go.

123232.「レベルを上げて覚えた呪文は\n 覚えた職業でしか使えない 専用のものだ。\n:
When leveling up, you'll learn spells, and they'll only be available in the vocation you learned it.
However, there are two types of skills you can learn with "Skill Points": exclusive ones and ones usable by any vocation.
When looking at "Skill Points" or stats, you'll see (EX) next to exclusive skills. Make sure to check them carefully.

123233.「何について 知りたいのだ？\n<select_se_off>\n転職について\:
What would you like to know about?
<select_se_off>
Changing Vocations
About Skill Points
Transfer of Spells/Skills
<select_end>
<break>

123234.「何について 知りたいのだ？\n<select_se_off>\n転職について\:
What would you like to know about?
<select_se_off>
Changing Vocations
About Skill Points
Transfer of Spells/Skills
Special Training Mode
<select_end>
<break>

123235.「スキルポイントは すべての職業で\n レベル２以上から 少しずつ取得していく\:
Skill points are earned gradually beginning at level 2. Think of them as like a blessing from the Allmighty Alltrades.
By allocating your skill points with the "Skill Points" command under "Misc.", you can learn various skills and traits.
Skill points are unique to each vocation. You won't lose them if you change, but they can only be allocated where they were earned.
So even if different vocations have the same skill lines, they will be assigned separately. Please remember that well.

123236.「転職とは もちろん 職業を変えることだ。\n はじめての職業に転職をすれば\n:
A career change is, of course, a change of occupation... When you change professions for the first time, you start your level all over
again. But each profession has its own level... If you change professions again, and you return to your original profession, your
level will return to your original profession, so don't worry... As long as you're qualified, there's no level limit to
changing jobs. You can change professions whenever you like, and you can always visit our priests...

123237.「お前のように 特訓を受けられる者なら\n ここでも レベル５０以上の職業の\n:
If you're one of those who can take training, you can start training mode here for any profession above level 50. In training mode,
you won't gain any experience fighting monsters, but you will earn training stamps. You can only earn training stamps from
monsters that are marked "Target" on the list of monsters to defeat. The stronger your opponent, the more Training Stamps you'll
earn. The stronger the enemy, the more training you'll receive.

123238.「どの職業に なりたいのかね？\n<break>:
What vocation would you like to pursue?
<break>

123239.「ならば どの職業に なりたいのだ？\n<break>:

<break>

your heart with visions of becoming a

292154.「転職とは もちろん 職業を変えることです。\n はじめての職業に転職をすれば\:

level all over again. But each job has its own level... If you change professions again and return to your original profession, your
level will return to that of your original profession, so don't worry. If you're a qualified candidate, there's no level
limit... You can change professions at will, so feel free to visit our priests at any time...

292155.「スキルポイントは すべての職業で\n レベル２以上から 少しずつ取得していく\:
Skill points are earned gradually beginning at level 2. Think of them as like a blessing from the Allmighty Alltrades.
By allocating your skill points with the "Skill Points" command under "Misc.", you can learn various skills and traits.
Skill points are unique to each vocation. You won't lose them if you change, but they can only be allocated where they were earned.
So even if different vocations have the same skill lines, they will be assigned separately. Please remember that well.

292156.「レベルを上げて覚えた呪文は\n 覚えた職業でしか使えない 専用のものです。\n:

anymore... But there are two types of spells you can learn with Skill Transfer: those that are exclusive to your profession, and those
that you can still use after you change professions. If you're looking for a special skill, you'll need to use the "Skill Recall"
or "Strength" command. It's a good idea to check...
